website_summaries.verdict: With its excellent design, useful software features, and low starting price, the Nexus 7 is the cheapest way to experience the best that the Android OS has to offer.
pros: The Nexus 7 features a sharp screen, a comfortable design, and great battery life at a low starting price
Android 4.2 adds some welcome and useful features
cons: Android still needs more tablet-optimized apps, newer games have frame rate issues, and HSPA+ speeds seem particularly location-dependent

customer_reviews.title: plenty of storage for apps and pretty quick functionality
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this tablet about two years ago. Initially, it offers a lot to a first-time tablet user: plenty of storage for apps and pretty quick functionality. However, there's no native camera app which isn't a big deal since you can easily find a free one on Google Play Store. Over time, I stopped using it as much and now the OS is pretty slow to start. If I don't use it for as much as a day, it is very sluggish doing pretty much everything, from opening apps to switching apps to swiping between home screen pages. This lasts for anywhere between 30 minutes to an hour but after that it is pretty smooth again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kitch

customer_reviews.title: Very slow, very very slow. At first I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very slow, very very slow. At first I thought it could be due to low configuration, but the 1 GB is enough for at least running one app. Then I thought may be multiple open apps in background could be making it slow, closing all apps didn't work either. Then I though the background processes might be the reason and shutting those down didn't work as well. Finally I gave up and gave it to my 2 year old nephew to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet and a Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 7.0 for the back camera. Both are great but I had an issue with the battery life of the Samsung. On the other hand I watch movies and play games all day with my Nexus and no problem. It is super fast, screen quality is great ( did a side by side comparison with the samsung) and the new jelly bean 4.2 overall experience is smooth. Don't get me wrong the Samsung Tab 2 7.0 is great but I will definetly buy another ]Nexus model when they announce it this year and give this one to my wife (she fights me for it everynight).
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Great tablets for surfing or watching video
customer_reviews.text: I use this primarily for watching Netflix or HBO go. My daughter uses it to play games. I also sometimes use it for surfing or Facebook. It works great for all the above. I like the weight and size better than my full-size iPad for a tablet. The battery life is not awesome, so that's why I took off one star. I have to recharge it after just a few hours use and - worse - it dies pretty quickly even when I'm not using it and even when I have it fully powered off. Still nice to have around though if you can get into the habit of charging it very regularly.
customer_reviews.author: jdickey

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet all in all but for a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet all in all but for a couple of things. Front only facing camera. I'm not that vein that I have to take pictures of myself. In fact, I've never used it. Also, the company sucks to work with. My first one developed a thin line across the display, not the glass but actually in the display. They tried to tell me I dropped it and all kinds of stuff. Then they told me it was out of warranty 8 months before I even bought it! Amazon replaced it no problem since it was still within 30 days. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: IsItJuneYet?

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money or headache.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present, but after the system update the whole thing starts to lock up. Battery life is about a half hour after a full charge. The battery is built into the tablet so it can't be accessed. I've tried to solve the problem, but all attempts have failed. Save your money and pick up a better tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Android is subpar and support requires dealing with multiple companies
customer_reviews.text: The device arrived with faulty speakers that sound distorted and tinny when the volume is above 30%. A quick search indicates its a common problem. After spending 40 minutes with Google support I was invited to start the process from scratch with ASUS. No thanks. I'll just go back to using my iPad. I was expecting to be very happy with the device. I figured Android was well matured and I'd love it. Nope. After years of iPad use I was quite surprised that the device was not responsive, buggy (played audio randomly at 3AM and woke me up), and ran down the battery with minimal use. Tossing this in the drawer and going back to iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: This product won't update, at all. Says there's not enough room a 200 mb update even tho there's more then 20 gigs free. There is basically no sound at all. It takes forever to connect to the internet and once it does, it won't allow apps that use the internet to connect. It also keeps changing time and location on its own. And much more aweful experiences. Waste of money that I did not get back BTW.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Webb

customer_reviews.title: Like new.
customer_reviews.text: My 2013 model was destroyed. This 2012 unit was exactly as advertised; like new, and the price was right. It's slower than the 2013 and must have a case with a magnet to "sleep" rather than fully reboot every time you use it. The case was critical. It also speeded it up to turn OFF or uninstall lots of unnecessary Google Play options!
customer_reviews.author: T Hill

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: This thing is trash. Opened the box; plugged it in to charge; started it up, and it's immediately "storage space running out". It's supposed to be a 16GB device. It says there are 13.18 GB available, but that's "Not enough storage for the system". Save yourself a bunch of wasted time and avoid this seller.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: $60 used tablet is freaking steal!
customer_reviews.text: For 2012 previously used at $60, this thing was a steal. I did initally update to Lolly pop and ran very good, but I needed to use some apps that haven't caught up yet, so I had to unlock and flash rom back to kitkat. I've never really liked tablets before, but got this for my drone project and I've found myself using it almost every day for 2 weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: William B. Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: just no lollipop
customer_reviews.text: Excellent device, but use any operating system other than lollipop. For one it took almost 3 minutes to start up, where KitKat is 1 min. Apps hang and lagg really bad on lollipop, so I upgraded to 5.1.1 and still same garbage.that was the end of my frustration so I learned how to downgrade back to KitKat and guess what device works damn near flawless now. super happy I bought this, for 60 bucks u can't beat it,refurbished of course
customer_reviews.author: Danny Mo

customer_reviews.title: **A Good Buy**
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying a 1st generation tablet to replace mine that had stopped working. The description they gave was inaccurate it was for a 1st generation tablet but I received a 2nd generation tablet and at first I was upset and wanted a refund until I did some research on what they sent me. And to my surprise I had a better tablet than I realized. I cancelled my refund and I'm enjoying my new 2nd generation tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra
customer_reviews.text: I expected a Nexus 7 that was at least 2012, what I got was a thick as a brick, no camera in the back 2011. What a blind side! The package said, made in China 03/2013 but after a call to Amazon the rep said this was a 2011. A friend who has a 2013 pointed out the difference between this unit and the 2013 and it's night and day. As the heading stated spend the extra and buy the 2013. By the way on the 2013 the Nexus on the back of the case is parallel with the long side of the case and there is a camera lens facing towards the rear.
customer_reviews.author: Good ole Jim

customer_reviews.title: Returned !!!
customer_reviews.text: No rear facing camera, and did not realize that this is the first generation. 2012 version.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: I thought I would miss stuff...
customer_reviews.text: But, I was so wrong. Yes this is the first generation of the device, yes this does not have a rear camera, but this does not matter. Ease of use lots of memory and excellent display. Great sound and great touch response allows you to do what some tablets wont. And it is VERY quick! (quad processor) so not much in the way of lag or delay launching an app. I got a reconditioned one and love it even more because I got a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Murl Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Super small tablet....great screen for flicks!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to bedtime flick tablet...just right for bedtime movies while snuggled under the comforter...I don't use it for much else, though I see the capabilities and will likely take it traveling soon to check out the email and other features in lieu of using a smart phone--prefer this screen size...what I really want is a phone the size of this small tablet. They're coming, I think...or a tablet that's also a phone?
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet for the price... purchased it for someone and they pawn it... I was highly upset... Nexus is created by google so it would be the first to get updates and because the android software was hot and has a great play store I thought the person would love it, apparently not.. but I did.. shipped fast and was in excellent condition as expected..
customer_reviews.author: Kisrael

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my son who is in college. He wanted something that he could read books on, watch movies, surf the web, etc. This nice little unit fit the bill and he loves it. Easy for him to carry around and runs smoothly. Powerful enough to stream a full movie with no buffering. Quality was much better than I expected for the price of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I loved this tablet for about 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this tablet for about 3 months, where it developed "ghost touches". I even enabled the dev mode to see them. They made it impossible to play games and reading requires pressing the screen-off button every 10-30 minutes. I highly recommend against this tablet even for its price and capabilities. The newest version might be fine; I have no idea.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Still going strong after 3-4 years, a bit outdated now but that's the nature of portable electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Barry J. Aiello

customer_reviews.title: not what I thought I was ordering
customer_reviews.text: These are outdated and foreign products. I had to return them. Instructions were in a foreign language. I couldn't waste my time and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Cautious buyer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife since she complained about her Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 was too heavy. She really likes the size and weight of this Nexus 7" Tablet. The colors are vibrant, the images are nice and clear, the screen is very responsive to the lightest touch, and she likes to take it to bed to read or play games until she gets sleepy, where the 10" Samsung was too heavy to hold up. And the price was less than half of what the Samsung was.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product.
customer_reviews.text: So i bought this for my boss to help with his youtube video production - the screen is faded in the lower left quadrant. I am pretty unhappy about this. Wishing i would have tested it prior to giving it to him. Feel like a complete tool!
customer_reviews.author: Dana  Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy refurbished!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product refurbished and it worked for less than 25 days. Completely a waste of money. Can't return it. With that being said, I'm sure if i had ordered this device brand new I probably would have been satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Better than like but not love
customer_reviews.text: OK, 4.5 stars. Better than like but not love. I've had it about 8 mths. now. The only issue I've had is that every few days it will lock up and I will have to power it down and restart. Maddening when you're into a lengthy message, as all is lost. I"ve not used the camera, so can't comment on that. I got this one for the GPS which works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nak

customer_reviews.title: Listing wasn't exact
customer_reviews.text: CellularStream is who I got mine through. Love the nexus 7 for my alt for my nexus 5. Also my screen feels a bit squishy as if the screen isn't sealed in correctly it was listed as good meaning average amount of scratches from normal usages, but nothing was said about screen was loose.
customer_reviews.author: ManYouForgot

customer_reviews.title: Nexus 7 - a great return for what I paid.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my son. He is the perfect usage validation "engineer" :-) He is treating it roughly, physically and "mentally" (loading lots of stuff all the time). For months, the device is going some rough times, and so far so good!!! Also we are getting android updates on time. You can say I am very pleased with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: For what it is, I had expected it to ...
customer_reviews.text: For what it is, I had expected it to run a bit faster. It does what I need it to, but there are times when it definitely lags noticeably.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet was FANTASTIC until the update. That update destroyed my tablet. I wish I had never installed it. The nexus products are very good. Their worth buying....just be careful of operating system updates.
customer_reviews.author: Maisha

customer_reviews.title: (Still) a great and affordable tablet
customer_reviews.text: (Still) a great and affordable tablet. The performance and battery life are excellent and there are plenty of custom ROMs and forums with support and guides for tweaking this device. It's an ideal device to keep around the house for occasional web browsing or reading.
customer_reviews.author: machinebreaker

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this tablet. We never leave home without it. I use it at work to listen to AM radio and audio books. My son watches Netflix and plays games as well as educational games. Great tables, like it more than the iPad we once had.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Severing-Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good but not a great deal
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is good, the reason for the 3-Stars is that it was advertised as having 16GB Flash Memory but I received a model with 8GB Flash Memory instead. Not a deal-breaker at the $80 price (used) I paid but a marginal deal not worth the hassle of returning/exchanging. Does what I want a tablet for (Internet/Documents/Media/Games on-the-go) and paired with a clam-shell Keyboard/Case and OTG adapter for flash drives is the perfect portable computer.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C. Cumminsky

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we have purchased. I am not a huge techgeek but it is a great tablet for games and internet. This one was purchased for my four year old if that tells you anything about how easy it is to use.
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Canon EOS 5D
customer_reviews.text: Very fast, for some reason the platform doesnt support many major apps, even with an update, but I will only be using it as a live view monitor for my video camera. Works fantastic for this. Also, I wish I actually took the time to read books, it would be great for reading. So the refurbishing of this unit worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just plain-WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This little gizmo is impressive. Everything is well thought out and easy to use. The screen is bright and very clear. It's super fast. I was amazed that this little 7" tablet is quad-core. The only previous experience was my iPad 2, which I still have and use. I find myself grabbing this Nexus 7 because of its size and speed. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Wow, am I glad I got this one. This tablet exceeds all my expectations of what a tablet should do. Got it for the wife for Xmas. I don't think she's put it down yet. Great for the gamers with "older" eyeballs. Does everything a smartphone does except make calls, with a much larger display. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: elegant tablet
customer_reviews.text: Characteristics many suitale tablet, fast in speed, pre-azap installed programs generally good, covers all the requirements expected of her, arrived in good time, did not come damaged, can greatly benefit from its qualities, but there are many in the market price for their advantages and disadvantages and it seems to me the ideal for my needs thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mario Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: What can I say? I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I LOVE IT. My sister wanted a nook so I bought a 'NOOK' for my sister, she loved it. BUT, when she saw what I bought, she said, "WOW! I wished I known that there was this (Nexus 7) out there. I would have let you buy me one".
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its very slow and takes a lot time to reload anything i'm very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Karla S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 14 year old son...I love the way this tablet works....Great gift for Christmas......with fast shipping....great packaging and it worked right out of the box...just connected to wifi....with no problem and up n runnin in no time.....luv this product Excellent Tablet
customer_reviews.author: 2Blessed4Stress

customer_reviews.title: Best 7" Android
customer_reviews.text: The Nexus is hands down, the best 7" Android tablet you can buy. I have 2 and both have exceeded expectations. Could not imagine paying $100 or more extra for an Apple. The Nexus is only $20 or so more than other high-quality Android tablets, and it is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: By far the best 7" tablet on the market
customer_reviews.text: By far the best 7" tablet on the market. I've bought several cheapies for grandkids, and they were worth just what I paid for them...crap. Good enough for games, nothing else. The Nexus does everything Google can do, plus.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Great Device
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device and does everything I need it to do, I love the battery life and the screen is bright and clear. My only complaint is I had to modify some of the settings on my router so this would have better than a 1.3 MB connection.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: Both tablet and service were great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Nexus 7 from seller pspcorman. Amazon's tracking service said it would get to my house by April 8. It got here on the 21st of March! It arrived in very good condition with only a few light scratches on the screen. My only gripe with it would be that he seller, pspcorman, did not wipe/reset the device to factory settings before shipping it. When I got it, I was signed in to his email, facebook, google play account, etc... Other than that, I have no complaints. Thanks for a great product and great service!
customer_reviews.author: Aswan Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: I like the Nexus 7
customer_reviews.text: I use the Nexus as a research tool while I'm in class. The size is ok, but my eyes are getting old enough that I would like a larger screen that allows me more than a few words when I have to enlarge the text to read it.. I had some difficulty with connecting it to wifi sources, which is the only reason it didn't get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: KarenC

customer_reviews.title: Nexus 7 is FAST
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet for it's speed, which even impressed my tech-savvy son. He has all kinds of tech-toys, and yet when I let him try my Nexus 7, he was blown away by it. I have no complaints about this tablet whatsoever, and would buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Vic Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tablet, I bought this used but it's just like new and no problems with it at all. My tablet actually has more than 16 gb, not sure how but I am not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: IrishFae

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have had this tablet for a while and love it, recommended to friend and family and not 1 complaint. Very fast and responsive and would not pick any other. Battery life is great and not a single issue thus far and I own both generations 1 3g and the other wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Kolacsky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 1st gen non-HD Nexus 7 tablet with long-term Android support and millions of apps.
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with Google's Nexus products. While this first gen (2012) model isn't HD or anything, but you could already get the KitKat Android 4.4 update (thanks for the long-term support!) Overall both the hardware and the user-interface are excellently designed and they make the tablet very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tablet for over a year now. It worked fine at first (for about 2 months) but now it is an absolute piece of crap. I can't even load simple websites without the OS crashing. I would not recommend this tablet for any person, even if Asus and Google were giving it away for free. This is one of the worst purchases I have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Culbreth

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Battery dies
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Battery dies, then won't turn back on. Garbage. Amazon took care of me even though it was WAY out of warranty
customer_reviews.author: Happy Or Unhappy

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the greatest communication/entertainment devices I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the greatest communication/entertainment devices I've ever had. Easy to use, compact & t he resolution is better that most new televisions. This is the second Nexus 7 I've pirchased. This one was for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Shackle

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, fabulous price!
customer_reviews.text: My tablet is fast, beautiful & functional! I use it for FaceBook, Trivia Crack, Google Hangouts, Pinterest, Tumblr, StumbleUpon & more. I am very pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where to start? It said in the description it ...
customer_reviews.text: Where to start? It said in the description it has front and back cameras, it doesn't even have one. It's beyond slow. And I've had it for 30 hrs and I have had to reboot to factory settings 4 times. It charges very slow and came with a usb cable and WHITE wall plug. This is an apparent bait and switch.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer anderson

customer_reviews.title: so its more like a weak version of the current gen (written 9/23/15)
customer_reviews.text: Older model now, bought for my Special needs sister. fairly durable and solidly built. more powerful than others of its generation, so its more like a weak version of the current gen (written 9/23/15)
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mercer

customer_reviews.title: better than i expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a pdf reader, specifically, but it has surpassed my needs. I mainly use it for watching youtube in bed now, as the screen is incredibly crisp and bright. There is a surprising ubiquity to this miniature tablet, with it's speed and clarity. If you need a device for gaming pdfs, porn and email, this tiny monolith is your Excalibur.
customer_reviews.author: Gherkin Picklewater

customer_reviews.title: This is the best Android tablet yet.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet, and am having a lot of fun with it. Clear, bright screen with great resolution; dual processors; convenient size. I have an iPad, and the Nexus 7 and the iPad are almost neck-and-neck, with Apple having the edge in number of apps and seamless integration of media into its devices. Hope to see Google catch up and improve their own on-line ordering and download experience. It's a great platform.
customer_reviews.author: Magnus

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of variety (games, apps and movies) from play store. Great for keeping me entertained when traveling and uses the same travel charger as Motorola cell phone for long trips. I was surprised with only front-facing camera but have no opinion as this product was purchased for entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tablet for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tablet for our needs. I purchased for my 7 year old son for his birthday. Yeah it's not a 500$ tablet, but it's not super cheap junk either. It's a medium to low priced tablet that work well. If you are not looking to spend too much this is a good tab for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Dulak

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 for Christmas. One I kept for me and gave as gifts the other 2. Couldn't say enough about this android tablet, we all love it ( included my 5 and 3 year old daughters)
customer_reviews.author: elvy

customer_reviews.title: Only got to used the tablet once, the tablet won't charge, no battery light only black screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought the tablet for my daughter, she only got to used the tablet once, the tablet won't charge, no battery light only black screen. Tried all the steps.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: they was bad ....
customer_reviews.text: i got 2 or 3 maybe more going back2 /3 years they like my x nowadays i cruise around in my nevermind....
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: great new tablet for a used tablet price
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet, over exceeded all expectations. Basically a brand new tablet for a discounted price. Came in box with charger and no defects, great buy for $130
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for middle/high school students who need a tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for middle/high school students who need a tablet, but you don't want to spend the extra 300 on an ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Shaan

customer_reviews.title: Performs Great  Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: This compact tablet was purchased with the leather cover. It has almost all the features of the bigger I Pads. It does not have a camera for taking "photos" only selfies. It's handy book size makes it easy to take along. It was a gift so I would definitely look at again if another gift is in order.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Murfin

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves her new tablet, I just wish that i would have seen the warranty while i was buying this tablet. But its awesome and my wife highly recommends it, Plus the price was a Great price!!! Amazon is Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: kerb

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is my favorite. Amazon lost my order for insurance though so I had to buy a second one. That does not reflect at all on the tablet itself, which is why I gave it 5 stars. But they really screwed me over.
customer_reviews.author: German

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Product was terrible. It wouldn’t even boot up. I tried to reset and even tried putting it into recovery mode but nothing would work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine when it Works
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have a rear facing camera. Very hard to take pictures of things on the screen. Pictures usually end up having the volume picture in it. This tablet is very hard to charge and it doesn't work when plugged into the wall. If the tablet goes dead, good luck trying to recharge it as it won't turn on. Save your money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T Buy
customer_reviews.text: Piece of Crap! Worked for just a little over 1 month then died Right after my Return policy ended. Won't turn on, Won't Charge. It is Dead
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: loving my tablel
customer_reviews.text: I am a student and needed a real good tablet that wouldn't break the bank. The Asus Google Nexus 7 tablet is great for all my needs as a student and dedecated Candy crusher. The only con I have is that there is no extern memory slot but the 16g will work if I don't use it store pics and videos. This was a great buy and the delivery time was good.
customer_reviews.author: el.elgin

customer_reviews.title: one of the best tablets out there IMO
customer_reviews.text: This is my third nexus tablet. They are just well-made, reliable tablets. I like the android interface.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if the refurbishing was crap or the actual device was crap
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if the refurbishing was crap or the actual device was crap, but it was crap. Fancy not that use-full as door-stop.
customer_reviews.author: Rainfire

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is AWESOME......I love it, I take it when I have a doctors appointment. 'you know it gets boring just sittin there'. Battery life is great. And it really replaced my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: A little tight on the fit making it tedious to align but once it is in place it covers very well . Watching the video for installation tips will make installing simple. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Derfman

customer_reviews.title: Rocket Service
customer_reviews.text: This really worth of time and spending, this product was received as described with in great condition. for that it will rate as an A+++ it nice doing business with you
customer_reviews.author: John Milne

customer_reviews.title: buy it period!
customer_reviews.text: King of the android tablets for a fantastic price. Either version is excellent. I have replaced my computer with these tablets and I am very happy! ASUS kicked ass.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: A little slow but it works for what I use it for. I use it only for streaming netflix, hulu, and youtube to a chromecast dongle on my tv.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon A

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, awesome tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this Nexus 7 2012 edition! It has plenty of power and has updated itself all the way to Android 4.4.4! Awesome tablet, especially for the money!
customer_reviews.author: S. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much Amazon/ Excellent service! \o/ Love it.
customer_reviews.author: lana amarak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for On the Road Use
customer_reviews.text: Easy wireless internet connection and set up. Good internet browser. Works well for video and all websites. Lots of Google/Android apps. I am big MAC user at work but this tablet did everything I needed at home without the expense of am iPad. It is perfect for hitting the internet when I need it at home or on the road with minimal size. I use it as a tool when not in front of my desktops. I would not recommend it if you need to do work on it 8 hours a day. It is for convenience, on the plane, trips etc... Have not experienced any problems with it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Video Doc

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a used Nexus and you cannot even tell. It works beautifully. Thank you. If I can get another for my kids, I will definitely choose this seller.
customer_reviews.author: JCURRY65

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as posted
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the most current generation Nexus. Great condition. Really bright display. Suggest getting an anti glare shield if you will read on it out side.
customer_reviews.author: CConti

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my daugther She is really enjoying it. Nice
customer_reviews.author: Mario De Óleo

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. It is very user-friendly especially for those who are less tech savvy. The apps are easy to work with and overall the quality is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Smile

customer_reviews.title: Snappy
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous tablet at an unbeatable price. The display is gorgeous and it responds very snappy. It handles games well too.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet. I bought it in haste not realizing ...
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet. I bought it in haste not realizing such things as a second camera were not on this device. Its good to watch movies on in work @ break or lunch also for web browsing.
customer_reviews.author: Wes R.

customer_reviews.title: good but needs some work
customer_reviews.text: The nexus 7 on the whole has been very good. I purchased it initially for taking notes and plugging in my schedule while working. As time has progressed I've personalized it somewhat but findthe lack of.flash support annoying. The way the touch screen interacts with web pages could be a little better as well. There's no way to indicate you're hovering over something like you can do on the galaxy phones.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Leichsenring

customer_reviews.title: easy touch, size adequate to transport
customer_reviews.text: Tablets charge last long to enable reading,games.easy touch, size adequate to transport . priced reasonably and yet performs well as some more highly priced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Renee Eberling

customer_reviews.title: sorry for a poor review i gave this product.
customer_reviews.text: I want to apologize for a bad review I gave this product. I was premature when I rated it. I happen to really like it very much. Lots of great accessories for it also.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Sulkowski

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had an hdmi port and an additional (better) camera on the back. Otherwise would give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good condition, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! Very happy with quality. Product was in excellent shape.
customer_reviews.author: Bibliophile

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this particular tablet for use in a school program. I have not begun to use all it's features but it is a good price for a sound item.
customer_reviews.author: M. Montour

customer_reviews.title: My review
customer_reviews.text: I got this tablet for myself and wind up ordering another on for my daughter. She loves it so much and can't keep her hands off of it!
customer_reviews.author: Sistah Big Bone

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet! The right size for me personally
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet! The right size for me personally, and seller was not only prompt but quickly contacted me before sending it when they discovered that the scratching on the device was a bit more significant than the description had originally said. They even threw in a screen cover for the tablet for free in compensation for this. Much appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great delivery, great product. The Google Nexus 7 is probably the best tablet ever!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Comiskey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great tablet, great price and will work well in my car dash
customer_reviews.author: deonte stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter helped me get this and it was beyond expectations, just like new. I'm still learning to use it but having fun.
customer_reviews.author: mary jo

customer_reviews.title: Nexus 7
customer_reviews.text: I love my Nexus 7! I would recommend buying it! I have had no troubles with it! I have had to return 2 other tablets because of trouble!
customer_reviews.author: Leona Dennis Thompson

product_meta.title: ASUS Google Nexus 7 Android Tablet (16gb)
product_meta.description:
Specifications:


Operating System: Android 4.1 (Jelly Bean)

Display: 7" WXGA (1280 x 800) LED backlit IPS panel, 10-point multi-touch, 400cd/m2

Processor: NVIDIA Tegra 3 T30L quad-core @1.2Ghz

Graphics: GeForce 12-core

Connectivity: 802.11 b/g/n, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi direct

Memory: 1GB DDR3

Storage: 16GB Flash

Camera: Front 1.2MP

Speakers: 3D Stereo (Built-in)

Card Reader: 1x Micro SD Reader

Battery: 4325 mAh (Upto 10 hours of battery life)

Input/ Output: 2-in-1 audio jack (Head-out/MIC), 1 x Micro USB port
feature_bullets: With over 8 hours of HD video playback, 10 hours of web browsing, and 10 hours of e-reading, Nexus 7 is designed to go the distance.
The world first Android 4.1 Jelly Bean tablet
World's first 7 quad-core tablet delivers an advanced multimedia experience with up to 9.5* hours of battery life.
NFC experience on a tablet with a textured tactile design for enhanced comfort measuring just 10.45mm thin and 340g light
1 GB RAM, 16GB Flash Memory, NVIDIA Tegra3 Quad-Core, 1.2 GHz

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars506 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
